text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Tis not too late to seek a newer world.
author: Heraclitus

text: He who can, does.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

text: If it's not broken, tinker with it till you find out how it works.
author: Bob Proctor

text: Discipline is the mark of intelligent living.
author: Sathya Sai Baba

text: What a liberation to realize that 'the voice in my head' is not who I am. Who am I then? The one who sees that.
author: Eckhart Tolle

text: Loving thoughts and actions are clearly beneficial for our physical and mental health.
author: Dalai Lama

text: The world doesn't always give you want, but it often gives you what you need.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

text: Either you choose to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out into the ocean.
author: Christopher Reeve

text: Don't be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

text: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

text: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Andrew Carnegie

text: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: If you want to keep your memories, you first have to live them.
author: Bob Dylan

text: The deeper the truth in a creative work, the longer it will live.
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

text: You're never too old for anything.
author: Betty White

text: If you see yourself as prosperous, you will be.
author: Robert Collier

text: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
author: Zen Proverb

text: When you lose your desire for things that do not matter, you will be free.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

text: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
author: Epictetus

text: Life is either a daring adventure, or it is nothing.
author: Helen Keller

text: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.
author: Stephen Hawking

text: At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, then inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

text: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: A thing constructed can only be loved after it is constructed; but a thing created is loved before it exists.
author: Charles Dickens

text: It's the little things done consistently over time, straight from your heart, that have the greatest impact.
author: Unknown

text: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
author: Gary Keller

text: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Everyone has oceans to fly, if they have the heart to do it. Is it reckless? Maybe. But what do dreams know of boundaries.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: I admire those who do good and expect nothing in return.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
author: Stephen King

text: People have the illusion that all over the world, all the time, all kinds of fantastic things are happening.
author: David Brinkley

text: When you want to be honored by others, you learn to honor them first.
author: Sathya Sai Baba

text: The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.
author: Steve Harvey

text: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: The man who moved the mountain was the one who began carrying away the smallest stones.
author: Zen Proverb

text: Everything has beauty but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

text: FOCUS - Follow One Course Until Successful
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.
author: Pema Chodron

text: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
author: Epictetus

text: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.
author: Deepak Chopra

text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: If you see a get rich quick scheme, that's someone else trying to get rich off of you.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Keep true. Never be ashamed of doing right. Decide what you think is right and stick to it.
author: George Eliot

text: Normal is the average of deviance.
author: Rita Mae Brown
